content.data: I am an enthusiastic and ambitious web developer with over 5 years of experience in developing web applications, and a background in networking and design/ architecture. Direct and honest communication and reliability are my strong sides. I am very passionate about improving my tech skills, learning new tricks, and discover tools that save time and provide new ways to solve old problems. My biggest asset would be my inclination to question the choices, share knowledge and experience while spreading a positive attitude and strengthening cooperation.

responsibilities: development of internal angular app consumed by eight different products on more then twenty four different sports and games web apps

bwin.com, betboo.com, borgataonline.com, cheekybingo.com, coral.co.uk, crystalbet.com, danskespil.dk, foxybingo.com, foxygames.com galabingo.com, galacasino.com, galaspins.com, gamebookers.com, giocoditiale.it, ladbrokes.com, betmgm.com, partycasino.com, partypker.com, partypremium.com, pmu.fr, premium.com, slotclub.de, sportingbet.com, vistabet.gr
